source: National 211 network and Oregon Department of Veterans Services database

resources.name: Oregon Department of Veterans Services
resources.description: State agency providing veteran benefits, services, and support programs. Assists with disability compensation, education benefits, housing assistance, and employment services.

resources.name: 2-1-1 Oregon Information and Referral Service
resources.description: Free, confidential helpline connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food, legal aid, mental health services, and benefits assistance.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - National Support
resources.description: 24/7 confidential crisis support for veterans. Provides free support 365 days a year with trained professionals. No VA enrollment required.

resources.name: Veterans of Foreign Wars - Oregon Posts
resources.description: VFW membership organization providing VA claims assistance, financial grants, mental wellness support, and community programs. Free VA claims assistance from accredited service officers.

resources.name: American Legion - Oregon Department
resources.description: National veteran service organization providing member benefits, community support, youth programs, and connections to state and federal benefits.

resources.name: VA Benefits Administration - Oregon Region
resources.description: Federal VA providing disability compensation, pension programs, GI Bill education, home loan assistance, vocational rehabilitation, and employment services.

resources.name: Volunteers of America - Oregon Veteran Services
resources.description: National nonprofit with local Oregon chapters providing mental health services, affordable housing, community outreach, and veteran support programs.

resources.name: Operation Homefront - Military Family Support
resources.description: National nonprofit providing emergency financial assistance for military and veteran families. Covers rent, utilities, food, and healthcare assistance.

resources.name: Military Officers Association of America (MOAA)
resources.description: Organization for military officers offering benefits guidance, career transition assistance, financial planning, and exclusive member benefits.

resources.name: VetsinTech - Veteran Technology Employment
resources.description: 501(c)(3) nonprofit connecting veterans with technology education, employment, and entrepreneurship opportunities through VIT Academy and mentorship.
